name: Opportunity (FiveMeenutz)
description:
Opportunity is a short journey through the sensations derived from continuous failures and the achievement of one's goals.

This brief experience was developed in a matter of hours during a particularly complicated period of my life and helped me overcome my difficulties. I hope it can do the same with you and inspire you in some way.

Thank you so much for taking the time to play my game. I hope you have a wonderful day.

Andrea

Key mappings:

WASD/Left Stick: Move

Mouse/Right Stick: Look around

Gamepad is not supported in the main menu, please use a mouse to click start and then switch to a gamepad.

Music by Mattia Cupelli:

https://soundcloud.com/mattiacupelli
